name: DETATCHED - GamePerWeek #2
description:
DETATCHED

Become separated from your space station and drift into the infinite void of space. 

  • Collect strange orbs
  • Help guide the new life that has made your corpse home
  • Confront the end of time

Recent Additions

  • Switch between drifting and observing your colony growing with the Tab key
  • Limited the amount you can zoom in or out
  • Pressing Space whilst looking at the colony screen with bring up a panel to allocate orbs with different colours
